titleStmt.title: A true interpretation of the eleventh chapter of the Revelation of St. John, and other texts in that book as also many other places of Scripture whereby is unfolded, and plainly declared the whole councel of God concerning Himself, the Devil, and all mankinde, from the foundation of the world, to all eternity : never before revealed by any of the sons of men, until now / by Lodowick Muggleton, one of the two last commissionated witnesses and prophets of the onely high, immortal, glorious God, Christ Jesus.
titleStmt.author: Muggleton, Lodowick, 1609-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
